DOC.brief_summary: The objective randomized , control feeding study investigate potential health benefit pecan-containing diet . The investigator hypothesize chronic consumption pecan improve array biomarkers relate cardiovascular disease type 2 diabetes risk , include index oxidative stress , antioxidant activity , inflammation , endothelial function , insulin resistance compare control diet absent nut .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Pecans Biomarkers Risk Cardiovascular Disease Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Men & postmenopausal woman , age 50 year BMI 2535 kg/m2 Waist/hip > 0.8 woman > 0.9 men Blood pressure 120/80 159/99 Cigarette smoking and/or nicotine replacement use Individuals take estrogen Use cholesterollowering medication Use blood pressurelowering medication Regular use stomach acidlowering medication , laxative ( include fiber supplement ) antidiarrheal medication ( prescription overthecounter [ OTC ] ) Cardiovascular ( heart ) disease Gastrointestinal disease Kidney disease Endocrine disease : include diabetes , unstable thyroid disease Autoimmune disease : include rheumatoid arthritis , gout , lupus , HIV Active treatment type cancer , except basal cell carcinoma , within 1 year prior study admission Systolic blood pressure > 159 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure > 99 mmHg Regular use oral injectable steroid Gain loss > 10 % body weight within previous 3 month ; unwillingness maintain weight Regular daily intake â‰¥ 2 alcoholic drink Vegetarians Current allergy kind nut Dietary supplement use , include contain vitamin , mineral , herb , plant concentrate ( include garlic , gingko , St. John 's wort ) homeopathic remedy , probiotic , fish oil ( include cod liver oil ) , one month prior study admission
